channel.title: [PI] In-Game Hiscores [PI]

item.title: [PI] In-Game Hiscores [PI]
item.dc:creator: @nearfatality nearfatality
item.description:
@nearfatality wrote:

Hey, i’m obviously asking alot of questions here, cause I’m having allot of problems :L

I just made a Highscores in-game and it only shows the top 1 player?

The Code was This:

public void highscores() { getPA().sendFrame126("Near-Fatality Highscores", 6399); for(int i = 0; i < 10; i++) { if(ranks[i] > 0) { getPA().sendFrame126("Rank "+(i+1)+": "+rankPpl[i]+ "- Total Level: " +ranks[i], 6402+i); } }

And I changed it to this and still shows top 1 player but 10 ranks and all the same player :L

public void highscores() { getPA().sendFrame126("Near-Fatality Highscores", 6399); for(int i = 0; i < 10; i++) { if(ranks[i] > 0) { getPA().sendFrame126("Rank "+(i+1)+": "+rankPpl[i]+ "- Total Level: " +ranks[i], 6402+i); getPA().sendFrame126("Rank "+(i+2)+": "+rankPpl[i]+ "- Total Level: " +ranks[i], 6403+i); getPA().sendFrame126("Rank "+(i+3)+": "+rankPpl[i]+ "- Total Level: " +ranks[i], 6404+i); getPA().sendFrame126("Rank "+(i+4)+": "+rankPpl[i]+ "- Total Level: " +ranks[i], 6405+i); getPA().sendFrame126("Rank "+(i+5)+": "+rankPpl[i]+ "- Total Level: " +ranks[i], 6406+i); getPA().sendFrame126("Rank "+(i+6)+": "+rankPpl[i]+ "- Total Level: " +ranks[i], 6407+i); getPA().sendFrame126("Rank "+(i+7)+": "+rankPpl[i]+ "- Total Level: " +ranks[i], 6408+i); getPA().sendFrame126("Rank "+(i+8)+": "+rankPpl[i]+ "- Total Level: " +ranks[i], 6409+i); getPA().sendFrame126("Rank "+(i+9)+": "+rankPpl[i]+ "- Total Level: " +ranks[i], 6410+i); getPA().sendFrame126("Rank "+(i+10)+": "+rankPpl[i]+ "- Total Level: " +ranks[i], 6411+i); getPA().sendFrame126("Rank "+(i+11)+": "+rankPpl[i]+ "- Total Level: " +ranks[i], 6412+i); getPA().sendFrame126("Rank "+(i+12)+": "+rankPpl[i]+ "- Total Level: " +ranks[i], 6413+i); getPA().sendFrame126("Rank "+(i+13)+": "+rankPpl[i]+ "- Total Level: " +ranks[i], 6414+i); getPA().sendFrame126("Rank "+(i+14)+": "+rankPpl[i]+ "- Total Level: " +ranks[i], 6415+i); getPA().sendFrame126("Rank "+(i+15)+": "+rankPpl[i]+ "- Total Level: " +ranks[i], 6416+i); getPA().sendFrame126("Rank "+(i+16)+": "+rankPpl[i]+ "- Total Level: " +ranks[i], 6417+i); getPA().sendFrame126("Rank "+(i+17)+": "+rankPpl[i]+ "- Total Level: " +ranks[i], 6418+i); getPA().sendFrame126("Rank "+(i+18)+": "+rankPpl[i]+ "- Total Level: " +ranks[i], 6419+i); getPA().sendFrame126("Rank "+(i+19)+": "+rankPpl[i]+ "- Total Level: " +ranks[i], 6420+i); getPA().sendFrame126("Rank "+(i+20)+": "+rankPpl[i]+ "- Total Level: " +ranks[i], 6421+i); getPA().sendFrame126("Rank "+(i+21)+": "+rankPpl[i]+ "- Total Level: " +ranks[i], 6422+i); getPA().sendFrame126("Rank "+(i+22)+": "+rankPpl[i]+ "- Total Level: " +ranks[i], 6423+i); getPA().sendFrame126("Rank "+(i+23)+": "+rankPpl[i]+ "- Total Level: " +ranks[i], 6424+i); getPA().sendFrame126("Rank "+(i+24)+": "+rankPpl[i]+ "- Total Level: " +ranks[i], 6425+i); getPA().sendFrame126("Rank "+(i+25)+": "+rankPpl[i]+ "- Total Level: " +ranks[i], 6426+i); } }

It Shows this:
